DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Hemoglobin Result Data Validation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for hemoglobun, red respiratory protein of erythrocytes, to help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._The act of validating; finding or testing the truth of something._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for hemoglobin, red respiratory protein of erythrocytes, to help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: The red respiratory protein of erythrocytes, consisting of approximately 3.8% heme and 96.2% globin (64.5 KD), which as oxyhemoglobin (HbO2) transports oxygen from the lungs to the tissues where the oxygen is readily released and HbO2 becomes Hb.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: The red respiratory protein of erythrocytes, consisting of approximately 3.8% heme and 96.2% globin (64.5 KD), which as oxyhemoglobin (HbO2) transports oxygen from the lungs to the tissues where the oxygen is readily released and HbO2 becomes Hb.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._The act of validating; finding or testing the truth of something._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
